Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Timodikos. Frome the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0221.18 and an example from Antioch.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (265)
